name: Turn Based Football
description:
This is my take on the 'Teams Together' gamejam brief from Side Quest 3. The game is based off of the game Subbuteo.

Controls

Player 1 - WASD, 123, Space

Player 2 - UpDownLeftRight,  , . /  , Space

Unfortunately AI wasn't implemented due to having too many current university assignments.

Credits

Using audio from - Casual Game SFX Pack - ZSTRIEFEL

Using music from - Mega game music collection - Motivation

Everything else - Jonathan Ritson
